byline.original: By ELVIRE CAMUS; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF

abstract: Musee d'Orsay reopens after weeklong strike by workers to protest the fact that no additional workers had been recruited during the museum's expansive renovation.
snippet: Employees staged a walkout last Thursday, the day of the planned reopening of the Impressionist galleries.
lead_paragraph: Employees staged a walkout last Thursday, the day of the planned reopening of the Impressionist galleries.

headline.main: Musée d’Orsay Reopens After Weeklong Strike
headline.print_headline: Musée d’Orsay Reopens After Weeklong Strike
